args: It's been quite the wild ride since I started\nworking here, but I'm finally approaching\nmy savings goal.
At this rate, I should be set before\nsummer ends. I cannot wait to see\nthe children's smiling faces!
What's wrong? Was there an issue with the\nend-of-day ledger? A late delivery, maybe?
That's not it. We've actually got a group\nthat wants to book the whole restaurant\ntomorrow!
Oh! That's certainly new for us.\nStill, it won't pose a problem.
I am more miraculous than I was at\nsummer's onsetâ€”no customer shall go\nunsatisfied on my watch!
Now that's what I like to hear!\nYou really have changed, Amane.\nIt's apparent in all you do.
You're making me blush, Master.\nSo, where do our customers hail from?
Get this: they're all from the Halidom!
Excuse me! I'm {player_name}\nfrom the Halidom, and I have\na reservation.
Whoa! Amane really does work here. Ooh,\nand check out that uniform. Get it, girl!
Your support means the world. What a\npleasant surprise to have you all here.
They are all accompanying me on my\nvacation, you see. We figured we would\ndrop by since we were in the area.
I see. Well, make yourselves comfortable!\nHere is the menu.
Kindly summon us once you are ready\nto order. We will be right with you.
And in the event I have already settled\non my order?
You haven't even opened the menu,\nthough.
I needn't, for what I desire\nis not offered within.
I want you to cook something\nthat will impress me.
Are you certain?! If memory serves,\nAmane's cooking ability is...questionable.
Indeed. I remember her trying to pass off\na purple lump as ï¼‚foodï¼‚ in the past.
That was a long time ago! Now as long as\nI have the master's help, I can cook fine\ndishes! I have been doing it all summer.
I see. Allow me to amend my order, then.\nI want you to make something that will\nimpress me WITHOUT assistance.
Whoa there, Windy. Don't go teasin'\nher TOO much just 'cause you like her.
I'm with Ranzal. Restaurant staff work\nhard enough alreadyâ€”we really\nshouldn't be adding to their stress.
Very well!\nI accept your challenge, Windwyrm!
Ilia above... This could get messy.
You just watch! I'll show you what I can do!
Indeed. Still, had I thought it impossible,\nI wouldn't have accepted the challenge.
After all I've been through,\nI'm certain I can handle this.
Such confidence. You don't\neven want a few pointers?
Fear not! You have taught me this\nmenu front-to-backâ€”inside and out.
All I need to do is apply that knowledge\nto create a unique dish that will please\nour discerning customer. Trust me, Master.
Then I guess that makes me your\ncheerleader! You've got this, Amane!
My apologies for the wait, Windwyrm.\nI assure you, this dish is ALL my own work.
Ha ha. I'm glad you think so!\nNow, let your tongue be amazed!
Patience, child. Know that I am not easily\nimpressed. Now let us see...
Mwa ha ha. I hope you weren't expecting\na bland meal from ME, of all people!
Behold: a dish made especially for you,\nbased on all I learned of your tastes\nduring my time at the Halidom.
I dub it...my Miraculous Windwyrm\nSpecial! Well? What do you think?
Indeed. I expected that your heart\nwould be set on proving me wrong\nfor daring to doubt you...
...but all I can sense from this dish\nis a genuine desire to please me.\nI could not be more impressed.
My intention was only to assess how\nmuch you have grown since that day\nyou first dared to call me a friend.

The result surpassed my wildest
expectations. Your dream of achieving
peaceful harmony between humans
and dragons is genuine, young Amane.
Hah! But of course! I stand before you\nas more than just the Child of Miraclesâ€”
I am also the Kitty Cafe's shining star!\nI will stop at nothing to please my guests!
Whew... What a day.\nI'm glad everyone left happy.
Here I thought we couldn't get any busier,\nand then today happened. Still, it was fun!
Summer's end is nearly upon us.\nWhich means...
Aaah! Wh-what is it, Master? I've finished\ntidying up and getting everything ready\nfor our next customers.
Hee hee! I come bearing good news.
Here's your pay for the day.
Much obliâ€”\nWHOA! This is... This is enough to\nachieve my savings goal! Are you sure?
Of course. You really gave it your all today,\nso I figured you deserved a little bonus.
Thank you so much, Amane.\nI've been very fortunate to have you.
I-I should be the one thanking you!\nMy debt to you is profound.\nBut I don't have a moment to waste!
I need to start by buying at least a\nhundred buckets of the finest custard!
Then a human-sized flan and a MOUNTAIN\nof chocolate! And a month's worth of cake!\nOh, this is going to be GLORIOUS!
Okay, I didn't put THAT much money\nin the envelope...
What?! You're telling me an entire\nsummer's worth of toil still hasn't\nearned me enough?
If you think this is enough money for\neverything you just listed, you've lived a\npretty sheltered upbringing, sweetheart.
I-I see. Before I started working here,\nbeing the Child of Miracles was the only\nï¼‚jobï¼‚ I ever had. No matter. I won't give up.
If I can't buy all of the sweets I want to,\nI'll just have to save money by making\nthem from scratch instead!

I'm sure I can craft the finished products
myself with all of my experienceâ€”
I'll even invite the children to bake them
with me! Oh, but I AM a genius.
What a wonderful idea, Amane.\nYou really have grown.

When you first came here, you were
wetter behind the ears than a newborn
porpoise. Er, if porpoises had ears. 
But now? Just look at you.
I owe my transformation to all the\nfun I had throughout the summer.
I will forever treasure the memory of\nthis fleeting respite from my duties.
When you employed me,\nyou changed my life forever.\nThank you, Master.
Hee hee. The pleasure was all mine.\nYour delight was infectious, after all.
You've already perfected your winning\nKitty Cafe smileâ€”now go on and share\nit with all the children back home!
